Package common.math

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.math.Point
  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic class that represents point in n-dimensional space. Objects of this class are mutable.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      double[] coordinates
      Stores data about coordinates in space.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Point​(double... data)
      Creates a point located at data coordinates.
      Point​(int size)
      Creates a point located at zero coordinates.

      • coordinates

        public final double[] coordinates
        Stores data about coordinates in space.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Point

        public Point​(int size)
        Creates a point located at zero coordinates.
        Parameters:
        size - Number of dimensions. Usually 2 or 3.

      • Point

        public Point​(double... data)
        Creates a point located at data coordinates. Number of dimensions is calculated automatically from amount of coordinates.
        Parameters:
        data - Coordinates that the point has.

    • Method Detail

      • distanceTo

        public double distanceTo​(Point p)
        Calculate distance between this point and given one.
        Parameters:
        p - A point to which the distance is calculated.
        Returns:
        Distance between points.

      • checkDimensions

        protected void checkDimensions​(Point p)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if two points has the same amount of dimensions.
        Parameters:
        p - A point against which number of dimensions is checked.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If number of dimensions in p point differs from this point.
